content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences, but here are some tour operators and travel agencies in Cape Province that may help you plan your trip:

1. African Budget Safaris
2. Earthstompers Adventures
3. Intrepid Travel
4. Cape Discovery Tours
5. Drive South Africa
6. Southern Africa 360
7. African Eagle Day Tours
8. Wetu Travel Company
9. Rhino Africa
10. South African Tourism Board

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list, and you should do your own research and compare the packages offered by each operator to find the one that suits your preferences and budget.
